com.gilran.chess.android

Class BoardActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.gilran.chess.android.BoardActivity

  • public class BoardActivity
extends Activity
    The board activity of the Chess android application. This activity is most of the application, managing seeks and all in-game actions.
    Author:
    Gil Ran

    • Nested Class Summary

      A callback for seek.

        A connection to the chess client service.

      • username

        private java.lang.String username
        The local player username.

      • game

        private Game game
        The active game. Used only during a game.

      • pieceColor

        private Piece.Color pieceColor
        The piece color of the local player. Used only during a game.

      • moveSource

        private Coordinate moveSource
        The from coordinate of a move. Used only during a game, only when it's the local player's turn, and only when the user chose a source square for a move.

      • board

        private GridView board
        A grid view used for drawing the board.

        A square adapter for the board grid view.

      • markActivePlayer

        private void markActivePlayer(Piece.Color activePlayer)
        Adds the active player marker to the active player.

      • resetBoard

        private void resetBoard()
        Resets the board to an empty board with no game.

      • applyMoves

        private void applyMoves(java.util.List<Proto.MoveProto> moves)
        Applies the moves received as part of a game event.

        Applies locally the first move, which is the move the player indicated. This is needed in order to update the position and calculate legal moves for the next move. The locally calculated moves list should be identical to the received list.

      • handleDrawOffer

        public void handleDrawOffer(Piece.Color color)
        Handles a draw offer.

      • handleDrawOfferDecline

        public void handleDrawOfferDecline()
        Handles a draw offer decline or withdraw.

      • gameEnded

        private void gameEnded(Proto.GameStatus status)
        Called when the game has ended.

      • seek

        private void seek()
        Seeks an opponent.

      • offerOrAcceptDraw

        private void offerOrAcceptDraw()
        Offers draw or accepts pending draw offer. Behind the scenes, both of these actions are the same.

      • declineDraw

        private void declineDraw()
        Declines a pending draw offer.

      • resign

        private void resign()
        Resigns the game.

      • handleCoordinateClicked

        private void handleCoordinateClicked(Coordinate coordinate)
        Handles a click on a coordinate on the board. If this is the first click, sets the coordinate as the move source square. If there is a move source square, tries to make the move.

      • setMoveSource

        private void setMoveSource(Coordinate coordinate)
        Sets the current move's source.
